privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_content: The data controller of your personal data is KOALKA. We make every effort to protect your privacy and process data in accordance with GDPR.
privacy.section2_item1: Contact form data (name, email, optionally company and message)
privacy.section2_item2: Analytical data from Google Analytics (anonymous visit statistics)
privacy.section2_item4: Device and browser information (for analytical purposes)
privacy.section3_intro: We process your data for the following purposes:
privacy.section3_item1: Responding to your inquiries submitted through the contact form
privacy.section3_item2: Analyzing website traffic and improving our services
privacy.section4_content: We use Google Analytics 4 to analyze website traffic. Google Analytics collects:
privacy.section4_item1: Anonymous visit data (number of visits, time on site)
privacy.section4_note: We have enabled IP anonymization, which means your full IP address is not stored. Analytical data does not allow identification of a specific person.
privacy.section5_content: The website uses cookies only after you give your consent. We use:
privacy.section5_item1: Google Analytics analytical cookies (after acceptance) - valid for up to 14 months
privacy.section5_item2: Cookies storing your consent decision - valid indefinitely
privacy.section6_content: Contact form data is stored for the time necessary to handle your inquiry, maximum 2 years. Analytical data in Google Analytics is stored for 14 months.
privacy.section7_intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.section7_item4: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
privacy.section7_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
privacy.section8_content: We may update this privacy policy. We will inform you about significant changes on the website. We encourage you to check this page regularly.
